A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A horrendous film and the worst chapter of the Star Wars legacy by far.  It is a disjointed movie riddled with gaping plot holes\, terrible dialog\, humor that misses\, annoyingly preachy social commentary\, and imbecilic characters that have little depth and clearly no reasoning skills.  They made so many ridiculously stupid decisions that I wanted several of the lead characters to die in the film.  Not only does this latest installment spit on the Star Wars legacy & lore as well as in the face of fans\, but it also paints a bleak picture for the future of the franchise.  Thanks for ruining Star Wars.
